mainVisual.imageAlt: The main visual of Vue Fes Japan 2025. It features a silhouette of a V, representing Vue, and a circle, representing the Japanese flag, side by side. The colors are deep matcha-like shades derived from the two colors used in the Vue.js logo, and the circle features a traditional Japanese gold marbling pattern.

logo.alt: Vue Fes Japan 2025 logo. It features a silhouette of a V, representing Vue, and a circle, representing the Japanese flag, side by side. The colors are deep matcha-like shades derived from the two colors used in the Vue.js logo.
